explanation: [0-0] The screen is split in two. The upper half shows a white sink with a water-dropped hand, above which a white bowl is filled with chocolate sauce. The lower half shows a white cat wearing colorful clothes sitting in front of a table looking at a mobile phone. There is a wooden bookcase behind the white cat, and there are many items in the bookcase.

[0-3] In the upper half of the screen, the chocolate sauce in the bowl above is poured onto a hand, and then the whole hand is covered with chocolate sauce. Then the picture switches to a hand slowly peeling off the chocolate on the finger. Then the picture switches again, a hand with chocolate has been completely demolded, and another hand above takes it off. This is a hand model made of chocolate. Then the picture switches, and a white disc contains a hand made of chocolate, holding two white ice cream balls and two strawberries, topped with sauce. Then the disc rotates a circle. In the lower half of the picture, the white cat is watching the phone intently.

[3-10] Then the picture switches, a white cat is sitting in front of the table, a black mobile phone is placed on the mobile phone holder on the table, the white cat sticks out its tongue, and the white subtitle "Okay" appears above. Then the picture switches, the white cat is standing next to a white table top, on which a golden square plate is placed with five hand models of different shapes. There are blue plush toys on the cabinet behind the white cat. Then the white cat pushes the plate forward. Then the picture switches, one claw of the white cat puts on the hand model, the other claw holds a spoon to pour chocolate sauce on the hand model until the whole model is covered, and there is still a lot of chocolate sauce left on the plate below.

[18-25] Then a color bar test chart appears in the picture, then the picture switches, a white plush object uses tweezers to pinch the edge of a plastic glove, the glove is bulging, tied with a rope at the mouth, placed on a golden tablet below.
